)pradhana pothhalwalin miladigatha haki jathika wirayinge rupa adangu pathrikawa harunu wita warthamanayehi men antharjalaya mangin awashya oonama rupayak ekenehi bagatha kota ganimehi pahasukam pilibandawa sihinen ho asa nothibunu apa bohowita kale chithrashilpayehi daksha wadimal sohoyuraku / sohoyuriyaka lawa ho mawpiyangen keneku lawa adala chithra andawa ganimaya.mapiya chithra shilpayehi salakiyayuthu nipunathwayak dakwuyen  ee karyaya ohuta bharawuye nirayasayeni.ohu wisin pansalen anda indiyanu thinthen  hada damu sumeriyanu pujakawarayekuge udukaya pilimayaka rekha chithraya mohothak dasa piyagath kala mata danudu mawi penenuye dashaka satharaka kalaya ek sanekin nimeshayakata hakuluwa lamini.maha aleksandar adhirajaya wisin parsiyawe deriyas raju thiranathmakawa parajayakala arbela hi satana pilibimbauwana sithuwama da  elesama  mage mathakayehi nomakena lesa satahanwa atha.melesa ithihasaya pilibandawa masitha piri ithirunu asimitha aashawa saha unanduwa nisama kulundul rakiyawa lesa ithihasaya saha purawidyawa adhyayanayehi saha sanrakshanayehi niratha aayathanayakata sambandha wannata labima mama  perakala punya karmayak paladimak lesa salakimi.anuradhapura abhayagiri dagaba saha ee awata akkara dahas gananak pura pathiri sanghawasa, wiweka shala, sannipatha shala, rohal aadiyen sadumlath abhayagiri wihara sankirnayehi sanrakshana katayuthuwalata sambandhawa jiwithayehi arunodayehi gathakala ee wasarakata mandak adhika kalaya pasu kaleka mage jiwithayehi mahath balapamak athikala bawa kiwahoth ee kisisethma asathyayak nowe.sanda pahan rayaka abhayagiri dagabehi salapathala maluwehi eraminiya gotha hindina sanda, sanda rasin nahawi giya maluwehi wasara dahas gananakata pera suduwathin sarasunu sahas sankhyatha uwasun uwasiyan dohoth mudun thaba hitipiyawara selmuwa pilima men hinda saya namadinu mama dutuwe warak dewarak nowe.
